overview.title: Theme System Overview
overview.description: Idealyst provides a powerful theming system built on react-native-unistyles. Themes are created using a fluent builder API with full TypeScript inference.

themeBuilder.title: Theme Builder
themeBuilder.description: Create themes using a fluent builder pattern. Define intents, radii, shadows, colors, and component sizes.

styleDefinition.title: Style Definition
styleDefinition.description: Use defineStyle() to create component styles with theme reactivity and variant support.

styleExtensions.title: Style Extensions
styleExtensions.description: Customize component styles using extendStyle() or overrideStyle() without modifying source code.

iteratorPattern.title: $iterator Pattern
iteratorPattern.description: Define styles once that automatically expand to all keys of a theme object (intents, sizes, etc.)

styleDefinition.title: Style Definition
styleDefinition.description: Learn how to define component styles using the defineStyle() function with full theme integration and variant support.

basicUsage.title: Basic Usage
basicUsage.description: The defineStyle() function creates reactive styles that automatically update when the theme changes.

variants.title: Variants
variants.description: Define multiple style variants that can be selected via props.

compoundVariants.title: Compound Variants
compoundVariants.description: Apply styles when multiple variant conditions are met.

styleExtensions.title: Style Extensions
styleExtensions.description: Customize component styles without modifying source code using extendStyle() and overrideStyle().

extendStyle.title: Extend Style
extendStyle.description: Add additional styles to existing component styles while preserving the original definitions.

overrideStyle.title: Override Style
overrideStyle.description: Completely replace specific style properties while keeping others intact.

usage.title: Usage in Theme
usage.description: Register style extensions in your theme configuration.

breakpoints.title: Breakpoints
breakpoints.description: Define responsive breakpoints for adapting layouts across different screen sizes.

defaultBreakpoints.title: Default Breakpoints
defaultBreakpoints.description: Idealyst provides sensible default breakpoints that work well for most applications.

customBreakpoints.title: Custom Breakpoints
customBreakpoints.description: Override the default breakpoints with your own values in the theme builder.

responsiveStyles.title: Responsive Styles
responsiveStyles.description: Use breakpoints in your style definitions for responsive layouts.

babelPlugin.title: Babel Plugin
babelPlugin.description: The Idealyst Babel plugin enables build-time style processing for optimal performance.

installation.title: Installation
installation.description: Add the plugin to your Babel configuration.

themePath.title: themePath
themePath.description: Path to your theme definition file.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: The plugin analyzes your style definitions at build time and optimizes them for runtime performance.
